compatibility.notes: The GFDL-1.2-invariants-only license has strong copyleft provisions, meaning that any derivative work must also be distributed under the same license. Care should be taken when combining with licenses that have permissive terms.

key_requirements: The document must contain a notice indicating it is licensed under the GFDL.
Any modified versions must also be licensed under the GFDL.
license.name: GFDL-1.2-invariants-only
obligations: Must include a copy of the license when distributing the document.
Must preserve the Invariant Sections if they are included in the document.
Must state changes made to the original document.
